short.ar: باكمان يسمح لك بجمع أكبر عدد ممكن من النقاط عن طريق أكل النقاط الصغيرة حول المتاهة.
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Adventure in Retro Games Pacman, where you'll navigate through a maze, devouring small dots to gather as many points as possible!
short.de: Erlebe Retro Games Pacman, indem du durch ein Labyrinth navigierst und so viele Punkte wie möglich sammelst, indem du die kleinen…
short.fr: Pacman vous permet de collecter autant de points que possible en mangeant les petites pastilles autour du labyrinthe.
short.hr: Pacman vam omogućuje da sakupite što više bodova možete jedući male točkice oko lavirinta.
short.hu: A Pacman lehetővé teszi számodra, hogy minél több pontot gyűjts, miközben megeszed a labirintus körül lévő kis pontokat.
short.pl: Pacman pozwala ci zbierać jak najwięcej punktów, jedząc małe kropki w labiryncie.
short.ru: Pacman позволяет вам собирать как можно больше очков, поедая маленькие точки в лабиринте.
short.sk: Pacman vám umožňuje zbierať čo najviac bodov tým, že zjete malé bodky okolo bludiska.
short.tr: Pacman, labirentin etrafındaki noktaları yiyerek toplayabildiğiniz kadar çok puan toplamanızı sağlar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pacman, a.k.a. Retro Games Pacman, invites you to embark on a nostalgic journey by munching on those tiny dots scattered across the maze, all while chasing those high scores. 🎮

Ah, the glory days of arcade gaming! This Pacman game is a true gem from the past, evoking memories of endless hours spent maneuvering through pixelated mazes.

In the realm of Retro Games Pacman, your goal remains unchanged: devour as many points as possible by consuming those little dots adorning the maze. And when you've triumphantly gobbled up every last dot, a new section eagerly awaits your swift maneuvering. But wait, there's more! This HTML5-powered game spices things up by granting you the power to gobble those pesky monsters after consuming special boosters, all for those coveted extra points.

But why settle for the classic mode when you can dive into an endless maze of challenges and surprises? Challenge yourself in various settings, each offering a unique twist to the game dynamics. Whether you're a seasoned player or a newcomer, there's always something delightful about Retro Games Pacman that keeps you glued to the screen, chasing after that exhilarating feeling of accomplishment with each new high score. 🕹️
